title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing the SaveAs operation on an existing java file, the file extension is not shown in the Navigator after the operation is completed.
EB: After performing the SaveAs operation on an existing java file, the Navigator should display the file with the correct file extension.
SR:
1. Open an existing java file.
2. Modify the file.
3. Click on the SaveAs icon next to the Save icon.
4. In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location.
5. Type the filename without the extension, as it is not requested.
6. Click Ok.
7. Observe that the Navigator displays the file in the specified location with the correct file extension.
